column4: network manager icon disappeared could someone help me, please
well what did you do with that??
ok ... apt-cache policy network-manager ... what does it say...
copy paste that line onto a terminal dear and paste the output there :)
ok it seems installed... so dont you see a icon near the clock
you must re-install the applet i guess
then do this sudo apt-get install network-manager-gnome
right click on the panel and click Add to panel
right click on the panel and click Add to panel , then add Network manager
no... right click on the Panel on the top of the screen , there Add to Panel... you get a drop down list ... there select network monitor
